creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com
text:
The kupu menu.xsp needs to be updated to reflect the moving of kupu to a module.

i.e. lenya.module=kupu&lenya.step=open instead of
     lenya.usecase=kupu&lenya.step=open

Created attachment 18808
updates kupu's menu.xsp with reference to lenya.module instead of lenya.usecase
creator: jonathan.addison@wyona.com

text:
Hmm, why shouldn't it use a usecase?

BTW, actually it uses lenya.module=kupu, has this patch been applied?
creator: andreas@apache.org
andreas@apache.org
text: It calls a usecase now, which is reasonable.
